channel.title: Kw’s Blog (wordpress)
channel.description: A blog about everything and nothing.

item.title: bit.ly Pro - New Features for Website Owners
item.description: I just be­came a bit.­ly Pro us­er - here's some in­for­ma­tion about it.

item.title: Language change + Kw's Devel Site
item.description:
A gi­ant up­date: The Kw’s De­v­el Site is now dead.

Well, the blog is gonna end with Pol­ish ar­ti­cles. It will be in Eng­lish. The next thing is the Kw’s De­v­el Site, a place for all my de­vel­op­ment stuff. Y­ou can­not vis­it it any­more.

item.title: Some of The Year 2010 Is Archived.
item.description: Are you look­ing for posts from 2010? Sor­ry, but some of them (specif­i­cal­ly, the ones in Pol­ish) are re­moved. You can find them here: 2010 Pol­ish Ar­chives. Un­less I re­moved some of them, which I did.

item.title: The Year 2009 Is Archived.
item.description: Are you look­ing for posts from 2009? Sor­ry, but they are re­moved. You can find them here: 2009 Ar­chives.
